abstract: Research published in New England Journal of Medicine reports that GlaxoSmithKline malaria vaccine now in clinical trials protected nearly half of the children who received it from serious bouts of illness.
snippet: A GlaxoSmithKline vaccine now in clinical trials protected nearly half of the children who received it from bouts of serious malaria, researchers reported.
lead_paragraph: A GlaxoSmithKline vaccine now in clinical trials protected nearly half of the children who received it from bouts of serious malaria, researchers reported.

headline.main: Scientists See Promise in Vaccine for Malaria
headline.print_headline: Scientists See Promise In Vaccine For Malaria
headline.seo: Glaxo’s RTS,S Malaria Vaccine Shows Promise, Scientists Say
